Header.title: Safe Eye Shielding Innocence
Header.paragraph: Safe Eye is a browser extension designed to protect children from unfiltered and inappropriate content on the internet. By automatically blurring adult material and harmful media, Safe Eye ensures a safer online environment, preserving the innocence of young minds while empowering parents with peace of mind.

About.paragraph: Hi, my name is Akashi (あかし). I am currently the App-Cloud team leader at the R&D Digital Center - RALACO and pursuing my Master’s degree in Mechatronics. With a passion for technology, I aim to become a Fullstack Developer. My expertise spans Front-end development with Web Apps (ReactJS, Angular) and Mobile Apps (Flutter, React Native), along with a growing interest in AI and Machine Learning. Additionally, I am a self-taught backend developer exploring frameworks like Node.js, Flask, and Spring Boot.
Why: Led a team in developing cutting-edge cloud and app solutions at RALACO
Diverse skill set in Web and Mobile App development
Strong foundation in AI, Machine Learning, and Mechatronics
Proven ability to manage complex technical projects effectively
Why2: Self-taught backend development skills with modern frameworks
Passion for continuous learning and technological innovation
Extensive hands-on experience in Front-end technologies
Dedicated to creating user-friendly and efficient applications

Testimonials.text: "Using this service has significantly improved our content monitoring. The AI detection is fast and accurate, saving us a lot of time and effort."
Testimonials.name: Alice Johnson

Testimonials.text: "The horror and violence video detection feature is amazing! It has helped us maintain a safe platform for our audience."
Testimonials.name: Mark Thompson

Testimonials.text: "Real-time video streaming safeguarding is a game-changer. We now have peace of mind knowing inappropriate content won’t make it to our live streams."
Testimonials.name: Sophia Lee

Testimonials.text: "I was impressed with how quickly the system detected and flagged adult content images. It works flawlessly for our needs."
Testimonials.name: Chris Anderson

Testimonials.text: "The text and image content filtering is so robust! It caught everything we wanted to block and made our platform safer for users."
Testimonials.name: Natalie Wright

Testimonials.text: "Excellent service with top-notch customer support. They helped us set everything up and were always there to answer our questions."
Testimonials.name: Michael Carter

Contact.address: 103/112 Ngoc Khanh street, Ba Dinh district, Hanoi city, Vietnam

Features.title: Adult Content Image Detection
Features.text: Automatically detect and block explicit or inappropriate adult content in images to ensure a safe environment for all users.

Features.title: Horror and Violence Video Detection
Features.text: Identify and manage videos containing violent or distressing content, promoting a safe and positive user experience.

Features.title: Real-Time Video Streaming Safeguard
Features.text: Monitor and safeguard live video streams in real-time to prevent the spread of harmful or inappropriate content.

Features.title: Text and Image Content Filtering
Features.text: Filter text and image content for offensive language, spam, or inappropriate material to maintain a clean platform.
